segment.source: Use the Application Utilization Report to track usage information for a specified application defined in the database.
segment.target: Use the Application Utilization Report to track usage information for a specified application defined in the database.

segment.source: You can use this report to determine how heavily a specific application is used.
segment.target: You can use this report to determine how heavily a specific application is used.

segment.source: This report generates a graph that displays the total daily usage over time during the reporting period.
segment.target: This report generates a graph that displays the total daily usage over time during the reporting period.

segment.source: This report also lists the following information:
segment.target: This report also lists the following information:

segment.source: Number of sessions—Number of times an application was used
segment.target: Number of sessions—Number of times an application was used

segment.source: The Application Utilization Report also includes a summary of the total usage.
segment.target: The Application Utilization Report also includes a summary of the total usage.

segment.source: When you create a report, you specify the parameters that are used for collecting the data when the report is run.
segment.target: When you create a report, you specify the parameters that are used for collecting the data when the report is run.

segment.source: Reports are not run automatically; you must run them explicitly to generate output data.
segment.target: Reports are not run automatically; you must run them explicitly to generate output data.

segment.source: The length of time it takes to run a report is determined by the amount of data collected in the data store.
segment.target: The length of time it takes to run a report is determined by the amount of data collected in the data store.

segment.source: After you run a report and the output is displayed in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can export the report into the following formats:
segment.target: After you run a report and the output is displayed in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can export the report into the following formats:
